main event: Witnesses observed an unidentified flying object in Soledad, California on November 7, 1955, which seemed to be hovering and made no sound.
interesting points: The object was reported to have hovered silently for about 5 minutes., Multiple civilian observers reported sightings of the object at different times., Observers described the object as solid and spherical, with a bright white color and a blue-green haze., A review of environmental factors indicated a freak weather phenomenon might account for the sightings., The investigation concluded that the sightings were insufficient for positive identification, with the possibility of being due to misidentified celestial objects.
sighted object: an unidentified bright object hovering in the sky
witness description: Four inmates from Soledad State Prison with previous military experience acted as Ground Observer Corps (GOC) observers.
